byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Pres Obama's final State of the Union address presents hopeful and ambitious vision for America, but concedes failures of his tenure, in particular his inability to bridge growing political divide; Obama chastises Republican presidential candidates for capitalizing on voter disenfranchisement for political gain and urges Americans to reject fear and misguided thinking that springs from it.
snippet: In his final State of the Union message, the president urged Americans to confront the challenges of the future by rejecting fear and embracing change....
lead_paragraph: In his final State of the Union message, the president urged Americans to confront the challenges of the future by rejecting fear and embracing change.

headline.main: Obama Confronts Americans’ Fears in State of the Union Speech
headline.print_headline: Obama Urges U.S. to Embrace Change
